QuestData.Title: Warlord Halthar is Back
QuestData.Description: He's at it again, $n. Warlord Halthar... terror of the shire. He and his drake were spotted causing trouble to the south, among the Thundermar Ruins.$B$BKill Halthar, $n! We'll send in some warbrands to help out once you engage.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He's a whirling dervish of spittle-flinging fury.
